tool_description: Retrieve Google Calendar Events from a public calendar

api_list.name: Calendar Events
api_list.description: This API allows users to retrieve events from a specified public Google Calendar.

required_parameters.name: src
required_parameters.description: Calendar ID (ending in `@group.calendar.google.com`). You can find it in the `src` parameter of the embed URL.

optional_parameters.name: months
optional_parameters.description: Number of months of events to retrieve. Default is `2`. Max is `12`.
